choices: These are optional questions to help us understand your experience participating in our study. As this is a pilot study, your feedback is valuable to us. Please take a moment to share your thoughts!

text: How satisfied do you feel about your experience participating our study?
How do you feel about your experience participating our study compared with other studies?
Please let us know if you have any feedback! This is a pilot study, so if you qualify, you will be invited to complete similar tasks. Please keep an eye out!
